movies.title: The Terminator
movies.Plot: A cyborg assassin from the future attempts to find and kill a young woman who is destined to give birth to a warrior that will lead a resistance to save humankind from extinction.

movies.title: Timecop
movies.Plot: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

movies.title: Dante's Peak
movies.Plot: A volcanologist arrives at a countryside town recently named the second-most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that a nearby long-dormant volcano may awaken at any moment.

movies.title: Face/Off
movies.Plot: To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent assumes the identity of the criminal who murdered his son via facial transplant surgery, but the crook wakes up prematurely and vows revenge.

movies.title: Godzilla
movies.Plot: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

movies.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
movies.Plot: Ace Ventura, Pet Detective, returns from a spiritual quest to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the sacred animal of a tribe in Africa.

movies.title: Indian
movies.Plot: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

movies.title: Conan the Destroyer
movies.Plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

movies.title: Dune
movies.Plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis to free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.Plot: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

movies.title: Battlefield Earth
movies.Plot: It's the year 3000 A.D., and the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, who are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

movies.title: Hollow Man
movies.Plot: A brilliant scientist's discovery renders him invisible, but transforms him into an omnipotent, dangerous megalomaniac.

movies.title: The Patriot
movies.Plot: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

movies.title: Mashaal
movies.Plot: A chain of events changes Vinod's life - from honest journalist to black marketer to an underworld Don and a Racketeer in order to combat Vardhan.

movies.title: Charlie's Angels
movies.Plot: Three private investigators are assigned to track down a kidnapped software engineer, but the case isn't as straightforward as it seems.

movies.title: Cast Away
movies.Plot: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

movies.title: Vijay
movies.Plot: Vijay is a story about people that are bound by relationships of love and friendship and how they become foes and take up weapons against each other.

movies.title: The End of Evangelion
movies.Plot: Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Neon Genesis Evangelion (1995).

movies.title: Man on Fire
movies.Plot: In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

movies.title: Labyrinth
movies.Plot: Teenage Sarah journeys through a maze to save her baby brother from the Goblin King.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.Plot: A husband and wife struggle to keep their marriage alive until they realize they are both secretly working as assassins. Now, their respective assignments require them to kill each other.

movies.title: The Island
movies.Plot: In 2019, a mercenary pursues a man and woman who escaped a research facility after learning their true fate.

movies.title: Four Brothers
movies.Plot: When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery, four brothers decide to investigate the murder and find the killers themselves, but not all is what it seems.

movies.title: Dhoom: 2
movies.Plot: Mr A, a fearless thief, steals valuable artefacts and teams up with the girl he is attracted to but cannot trust. Close on their heels are three police officers trying to apprehend them.

movies.title: The A-Team
movies.Plot: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

movies.title: The Hurt Locker
movies.Plot: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

movies.title: District 9
movies.Plot: In a future Earth in which aliens are isolated in a remote ghetto, a government agent finds himself banished there.

movies.title: Ip Man
movies.Plot: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to ...

movies.Plot: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

movies.title: Hit & Run
movies.Plot: Four friends hit a man while driving and must dispose of the body.

movies.title: Stolen
movies.Plot: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.Plot: A stranger's arrival triggers one man's battle to save mankind.

movies.title: Lone Survivor
movies.Plot: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

movies.Plot: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

movies.Plot: Members of an elite DEA task force find themselves being taken down one by one after they rob a drug cartel safe house.

movies.title: The Cloverfield Paradox

movies.Plot: A meteorite brings an extraterrestrial life to the earth. When powerful alien creatures threaten humanity, Commander Sing Lee's elite forces are almost wiped out, and the surviving soldier Tai Loi discovers an even bigger conspiracy.

movies.title: Yaksha: Ruthless Operations
movies.Plot: Nicknamed after a human-devouring spirit, the ruthless leader of an overseas black ops team takes up a dangerous mission in a city riddled with spies.

movies.title: Code 8 Part II
movies.Plot: Follows a girl fighting to get justice for her brother who was slain by corrupt police officers. She enlists the help of an ex-con and his former partner to face off against a highly regarded and well-protected police sergeant.

movies.title: The Witcher: Sirens of the Deep
movies.Plot: Hired to probe seaside village attacks, mutant monster hunter Geralt unravels an age-old conflict between humans and sea people that threatens war between kingdoms. Aided by allies, he must solve the mystery before hostilities esc...

movies.title: Ambulance
movies.Plot: Two robbers steal an ambulance after their heist goes awry.

movies.title: Mr. Car and the Knights Templar

movies.title: The Northman
movies.Plot: A young Viking prince is on a quest to avenge his father's murder.

movies.title: Green Snake
movies.Plot: Animated adaptation of the classic Chinese folktale. Sequel to the 2019 film 'White Snake'.

movies.title: Race to the Summit
movies.Plot: Fearless alpine climbers Ueli Steck and Dani Arnold enter into a death-defying rivalry to set speed records on the Swiss Alps' great north faces.

movies.title: Vengeance Is Mine, All Others Pay Cash
movies.Plot: In a society ruled by machismo, a hibernating "bird" becomes a serious matter. In a life of brutality, the sleeping bird is an allegory for a peaceful and serene life, even when the whole world tries desperately to rouse it.

movies.title: Demon City
movies.Plot: Framed for his family's murder and left for dead, an ex-hitman will stop at nothing to exact revenge on the masked "demons" who have taken over his city.

movies.title: Exterritorial
movies.Plot: When a soldier's son vanishes at a US consulate, she illegally remains on the premises to search for him, unknowingly entangling herself in a dangerous conspiracy.

movies.title: Ballerina
movies.Plot: Grieving the loss of a best friend she couldn't protect, an ex-bodyguard sets out to fulfill her dear friend's last wish: sweet revenge.

movies.title: The Rats: A Witcher Tale
movies.Plot: Follows a group of thieves as they plan the biggest heist of their lives against the most dangerous crime ring in the kingdom.

movies.title: Cat & Dog
movies.Plot: A trio of humanoid animals battle over a sword in the middle of a desert wasteland.

movies.title: The Great Flood
movies.Plot: A disastrous great flood sweeps the planet. On what may be the last day on Earth, a desperate fight ensues to save a child from a flooding apartment.

movies.title: Tiger Zinda Hai
movies.Plot: RAW Agent Tiger joins forces with Zoya in order to rescue a group of nurses who are held hostage by a terrorist organisation.

movies.title: Thugs of Hindostan
movies.Plot: A story about one man's love for his nation and another's love for power. An epic adventure filled with edge-of-the-seat thrills and war on the seas.

movies.title: The Electric State

movies.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
movies.Plot: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

movies.title: The Shadow Strays

movies.title: Revolver Rita
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.title: The Wages of Fear
movies.Plot: In order to prevent a deadly explosion, an illicit crack team has 24 hours to drive two truckloads of nitroglycerine across a desert laden with danger.

movies.title: Troll 2
movies.Plot: Nora, Andreas and Captain Kris leap back into action when a dangerous new troll awakes - and this time they'll need more help to take it down.

movies.title: The Covenant
movies.Plot: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

movies.title: Wanted Man

movies.Plot: Uta, the most beloved singer on the planet, is known for hiding her own identity when performing. Now, for the first time, she will reveal herself to the world. All of Uta's fans, including the Straw Hats led by Luffy, await.

movies.Plot: In southern France, Lino is a getaway driver, ex-convict, and burglar who builds cars for criminal purposes.
